definition: to build by laying bricks or stones

sentences.english: The reasons of damages of air distributing baffle walls, steel beams and brick works were studied.
sentences.chinese: 分析了導風牆，鋼粱及砌磚體易於損壞的原因。

sentences.english: Control lines shall be used for bricklaying.
sentences.chinese: 砌磚時應掛線進行砌築。

sentences.english: Construction workers walked out in protest at the sacking of bricklayers over 50.
sentences.chinese: 建築工人舉行罷工，抗議解僱五十歲以上的砌磚工人。

sentences.english: I encountered examples of the metaphor of bricklaying in my review of writers' accounts of their composing styles.
sentences.chinese: 我遇到的例子比喻我砌磚審查作家創作風格的賬戶。

sentences.english: The second brother became a bricklayer.
Sue and Johnsy had their room at the top of a brick building with three floors.
sentences.chinese: 蘇和薔希的房間在一棟三層樓砌磚建築物的頂樓上。

sentences.english: The brickwork was cast up in a few days.
sentences.chinese: 砌磚工程在幾天之內就完成了。

sentences.english: In this paper, the mechanism of brick-laying robot is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種砌磚機器人的機械結構。

sentences.english: At home I do all the housework by myself. I paint the walls and fit tiles," said defender Ndzovela.
sentences.chinese: 我在家承擔了全部家務，刷牆砌磚都不在話下。

sentences.english: Building workers walked out during the morning in protest of the sacking of a bricklayer.
sentences.chinese: 建築工人上午舉行罷工，抗議解僱一名砌磚工人。

sentences.english: Now, i'm going to show you something about bricklaying .
sentences.chinese: 我現在要告訴你一些有關砌磚的事。

sentences.english: The base of the column is rectangular with brick styling.
sentences.chinese: 該柱形火盆的基座是方型砌磚樣式的。

definition: see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
fight a battle of words/cross verbal swords

pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: no way out/nowhere to go/trapped beyond hope of rescue/painted into a corner
